Class Interval2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.alpano.Interval2D

  • public final class Interval2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Create a two dimensional interval given two one dimensional intervals (cartesian product) Immutable class
    Author:
    Mathieu Chevalley (274698)
